DOC.brief_summary: A study of flap thickness predictability in patients submitted to Laser in Situ Keratomileusis (LASIK) with the Carriazo-Pendular microkeratome (130 micrometers head size).
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Flap Thickness Results Using the Carriazo Pendular Microkeratome - 130 Micrometers Head.
DOC.criteria: LASIK candidates treated with the CarriazoPendular microkeratome 130 micron head corneal irregularities > 3D Thin corneal CCT < 460Î¼m Active anterior segment disease Previous intraocular or corneal surgery History of herpetic eye disease Corneal scarring Glaucoma Severe dry eye Topographic evidence of keratoconus
